reference.text: parts, details or accessories of agricultural machines or implements, in general A01B51/00 - A01B75/00

title-part.text: Apparatus, or methods of use thereof, for testing or treating seed, roots, or the like, prior to sowing or planting
Determining germination capacity of seeds or the like

CPC-specific-text.text: Testing seeds for determining their viability or germination capacity

title-part.text: Arranging seed on carriers, e.g. on tapes, on cords
Storage places for manure, e.g. cisterns for liquid manure

CPC-specific-text.text: Covers, roofs or other structures for covering manure storage places
Spreading by using worm or screw conveyors

title-part.text: for manure already laying on the soil
Making or covering furrows or holes for sowing, planting or manuring
Hand tools for making holes for sowing, planting or manuring
Machines for making or covering holes for sowing or planting
Machines for making or covering drills or furrows for sowing or planting

CPC-specific-text.text: Devices for making drills or furrows
Devices for covering drills or furrows
Furrow packing devices, e.g. press wheels

title-part.text: Machines for both manuring and sowing or both manuring and planting
Single-grain seeders with or without suction devices

note.note-paragraph:
Group A01C7/042 is impacted by reclassification into groups A01C7/0443 and A01C7/0445.
Groups A01C7/042, A01C7/0443 and A01C7/0445 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A01C7/044 is impacted by reclassification into groups A01C7/0445 and A01C7/0443.
Groups A01C7/044, A01C7/0445 and A01C7/0443 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A01C7/0443 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A01C7/042, A01C7/044 and A01C7/046.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A01C7/0445 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A01C7/042, A01C7/044 and A01C7/046.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group A01C7/046 is impacted by reclassification into groups A01C7/0445 and A01C7/0443.
Groups A01C7/046, A01C7/0445 and A01C7/0443 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Seeders depositing seeds in rows using pneumatic means
Ducts, distribution pipes or details thereof for pneumatic seeders
; Regulation of machines for depositing quantities at intervals
Regulating or controlling the seed rate
for sowing seeds of different sizes
using more than one feeding wheel; using double-run feeding wheels
Housings for feed rollers or wheels
with top delivery of the seeds
with bottom delivery of the seeds
Cell rollers, wheels, discs or belts

title-part.text: Seeders with spoon or bucket wheels
Seeders with other distributing devices, e.g. brushes, discs, screws or slides

note.note-paragraph:
Group A01C7/166 is no longer used for the classification of documents as of 2023-05-01.
The content of this group is being reclassified into groups A01C17/00, A01C17/001, A01C17/003, A01C17/005, A01C17/006 and A01C17/008.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Machines for depositing quantities of seed at intervals
Parts of seeders for conducting and depositing seed

CPC-specific-text.text: Chassis; Coupling means to a tractor or the like; Lifting means; Side markers

title-part.text: with other distributing devices, e.g. flaps, screws, horizontal turning plates

CPC-specific-text.text: for aquatic plants; for planting underwater, e.g. rice
Other parts or details or planting machines
Transplanting machines using seedling trays; Devices for removing the seedlings from the trays

title-part.text: for deeper setting or shifting of plants
Machines or apparatus for consolidating soil around plants
Methods or apparatus for planting not provided for in other groups of this subclass

CPC-specific-text.text: Bulk fertiliser or grain handling in the field or on the farm
Undercarriages, tanks, hoppers, stirrers specially adapted for seeders or fertiliser distributors

title-part.text: with pushers or stirrers in the slots

CPC-specific-text.text: or stirrers in front of the slots

title-part.text: with movable parts of the receptacle

CPC-specific-text.text: with pushers or stirrers in the slits
with pushers or stirrers in front of the slits

title-part.text: with means for lifting out the fertiliser
with means for pushing out the fertiliser, e.g. by a roller

CPC-specific-text.text: , i.e. side transporting elements, e.g. auger or screw conveyors, swash plates

title-part.text: Fertilisers or seeders with centrifugal wheels

note.note-paragraph:
Groups A01C17/00 - A01C17/008 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A01C7/166.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Centrifugal throwing devices with a vertical axis
Centrifugal throwing devices with a horizontal axis
Driving mechanisms for the throwing devices
Devices controlling the quantity or the distribution pattern

title-part.text: Arrangements for driving working parts of fertilisers or seeders

CPC-specific-text.text: the drive coupling being controlled by lifting or lowering of the seeding tools
Apparatus for sowing fertiliser; Fertiliser drill
Following a specific plan, e.g. pattern

title-part.text: Distributing devices specially adapted for liquid manure or other fertilising liquid, including ammonia, e.g. transport tanks or sprinkling wagons

CPC-specific-text.text: Sludge spreaders, e.g. liquid manure spreaders
provided with auxiliary arrangements, e.g. pumps, agitators, cutters
Distributing devices, e.g. for rotating, throwing
Distribution of liquid fertilisers by gravity flow

title-part.text: Special arrangements for delivering the liquid directly into the soil

CPC-specific-text.text: Sludge injectors, i.e. liquid manure injectors
Localised non-continuous injection tools, e.g. pal injectors, spike wheels
Other methods for delivering fertiliser into the soil

title-part.text: Adaptation of watering systems for fertilising-liquids

CPC-specific-text.text: Filling devices for liquid manure or slurry tanks
